credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross and cretan stitches on plain weave foundation; counted stitches
description: Small reversing floral border enclosing 2 bands of alphabets and numbers at the top.  Two verses ("Rising in the Morning" and "Going to bed at night").  Signed Ann Davies aged 7 1813.
name: Sampler
